item.title: Rework for Tornado
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
Well the issue with tornado IMO

In high skill games, it’s a verifiable ability, it takes fake claiming CW off the table. With it being the limited use high risk high reward ability… it lessens how suspicious it is to not have used it much, in favor of barrier which is mostly unverifiable.

in low skilled games… well everyone whines and complains if they happen to not check the right person etc… or some genious CW thinks they are helping everyone by moving the poisoned guy causing the phys to fail to heal him etc…

Link to an arguement I made just a bit ago today on why I oppose CW being made more verifiable (which making tornado the primary ability also does)

https://forum.imperium42.com/t/court-wizard-mimicry-ability/50377/7?u=vandalay
